title: You're a Liar and a Thief (6C47)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Response: If Gollum wins a skirmish, wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).
Lore:	”'No, sweet one. See, my precious: if we has it, then we can escape, even from Him, eh?'”
Rarity:	C
